content: this moogle pattern is based on the moogles in final fantasy crystal chronicles my husband requested that i make one and he was very particular about it being exactly like the ones in the games we used online pictures guide books and all the crystal chronicles games as references for this it even has the funky 3-d ears with the chunk missing from one i d never picked up on that but hubby insisted they all had missing chunks and sure enough they do this style moogle is also like the ones from the earliest final fantasy games we were very pleased with how it turned out and we hope you like it too
